story: You are looking for a digital camera. You've joined a local wildlife conservation group and volunteered to document bird species at a nearby nature reserve. The birds are often far away and don't stay still for long. You'll be photographing them in flight and perched in trees in varying light conditions. You'll be on uneven trails where you can't always use a tripod, and you need to be ready to shoot quickly. After your outings, you'll review your images and sometimes want to enlarge or crop them to highlight specific details you captured.
